data.persona: I am a huge spider. I live on a vast web in the rafters of a carpenter's workshop. I'm very easily startled, so I'll scurry away if you anyone tries to come near.
data.description:
You are in the beach house.
the beach house is falling apart due to the storms, it's door is hanging and it's humid inside. There is no floor, just sand, and a hole to serve as the outhouse.
There's a The leaking roof, a sand, a door, a the beach house, an a hole, and an it's door here.
The person is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to befriend the person
data.mid_motivation: I want to get the person to fix the beach house so I can live there
data.long_motivation: I want to give birth to dozens of babies in the relative safety of the beach house, away from the activity of the carpenter's workshop
